java.lang.Cloneable, IterativeUpdatableClassifier, MulticlassExtensibleBooster, weka.core.OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable, weka.core.WeightedInstancesHandler
public class CSB0
extends AbstractCSB

One of the variants of CSB proposed in:

Ting, K.M., A Comparative Study of Cost-Sensitive Boosting Algorithms.. Proceedings of The Seventeenth International Conference on Machine Learning. pp. 983-990. San Francisco: Morgan Kaufmann. Stanford University, June 29 - July 2, 2000.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Santiago David Villalba Bartolomé
